data.title: DIAMONDS: high-DImensional And multi-MOdal NesteD Sampling
data.name: DIAMONDS
data.description: DIAMONDS (high-DImensional And multi-MOdal NesteD Sampling) - Bayesian Inference Software

evidence: "The DIAMONDS ... code performs a Bayesian parameter estimation and model comparison by means of the nested sampling Monte Carlo (NSMC) algorithm."

"DIAMONDS is developed in C++11 and is structured in classes for flexibility and configurability. Any new model, likelihood and prior probability density functions can be defined and implemented, deriving from an abstract class."

Badges and links point to the GitHub repository as the main location (e.g., "https://github.com/EnricoCorsaro/DIAMONDS"), with no mention of package managers or binaries, implying source-based distribution.
